A <video> should not have a layer until playback begins.
This test can not be run manually, it requires testRunner.layerTreeAsText.

Case: No src, no poster
{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true
    }
  ]
}


Case: Displaying poster
{
  "layers": [
    {
      "name": "LayoutView #document",
      "bounds": [800, 600],
      "contentsOpaque": true,
      "drawsContent": true
    }
  ]
}
